qas.question: Odd-numbered streets are one-way in which direction?
Do most wide streets carry one-way or two-way traffic?

context: The numbered streets carry crosstown traffic. In general, <a0_0>even-numbered<a0_0/> streets are one-way eastbound and odd-numbered streets are one-way <a1_0>west<a1_0/>. Several exceptions reverse this. Most wider streets carry <a2_0>two-way<a2_0/> traffic, as do a few of the narrow ones.
